label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Creep denies now grant the denying team 30% of the XP bounty

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Normal deny XP increased from 50% to 70%
    • From either lane or neutral denies

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Shrinesnow start on cooldown and become available at 5 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Reduced Shrine count in base from 5 to 3
    • Removed the shrines from the top and bottom lanes behind the barracks

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Shrines mana regeneration growth per minute reduced from 1 to 0.75

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Added an extra melee creep in mid lane for the first 15 minutes
    • Until the first upgrade wave at 15 minutes, at which point all lanes have the standard extra melee

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Creeps meet a bit closer to the offlane tower

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Creep aggro duration reduced from 2.5 to 2.3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Creep aggro cooldown increased from 2.5 to 3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Lane creeps vision reduced from 850/800 to 750

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutrals now spawn every minute instead of every 2 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutrals now give 20% less XP and Gold

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Neutrals XP and Gold now increased by 2% every 7.5 minutes
    • Same as when lane creeps are upgraded

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Siege damagetype vs structures increased from 150% to 250%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Siege creeps HP increased from 550 to 825

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Siege creeps spawn rate reduced from every 7th wave to every 10th wave (Every 5 minutes)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Extra Ranged/Siege creeps now spawn at 40 minutes instead of 45

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All hero strength growth increased by 0.3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Regeneration coming from strength increased from 0.03 HP per point of Strength to 0.06

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reduced base HP regen by 0.25

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Intelligence's Spell Amplification from 1% per 15 to 1% per 14

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Mana per point of Intelligence reduced from 12 to 11

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Base mana increased from 50 to 75

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reduced melee creeps base XP bounty from 45 to 40

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reduced melee creep gold bounty upgrade from 3 gold per cycle to 1 gold per cycle

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee/Ranged Barracks team bounty reduced from 275/225 to 225/150 to each player

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan team bounty reduced from 200 to 150

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Shrine team bounty from reduced 150 to 125

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Death cost from 100 + NW/50 to 50 + NW/40

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 3 Tower Team Bounty from 240 to 200

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 4 Tower Team Bounty from 280 to 200

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Illusion gold/XP bounty from 5 + Level to 2 × Level

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Illusion building damage reduction from 50% to 60%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Buyback cooldown increased from 7 minutes to 8 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan now drops cheese from the second death instead of the third

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan armor bonus per upgrade interval increased from 1.1 to 1.3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Powerup Runes now spawn different runes on both sides of the river after 40 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Uphill miss chance no longer applies to flying units (e.g. Batrider using Firefly)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed various pathing issues with the bottom Dire creeps between Tier 1 and Tier 2

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Towers bonus armor based on nearby enemy heroes AoE increased from 1400 to 1600

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Replaced all 42 Respawn Talents in the game
    • Warlock: Summons a Golem on death (Level 20)
    • Pudge: +1s Dismember Duration (Level 20)
    • Magnus: +500 Skewer Range (Level 25)
    • Lone Druid: +50% Spirit Bear Magic Resistance (Level 20)
    • Lina: +40 Movement Speed (Level 15)
    • Enigma: +1 Malefice Instance (Level 20)
    • Earthshaker: +350 Fissure Range (Level 20)
    • Clockwerk: +40 Battery Assault Damage (Level 20)
    • Bristleback: +10% Spell Lifesteal (Level 20)
    • Earth Spirit: Geomagnetic Grip Targets Allies
      • No longer tied to Scepter
      • Enchant Remnant unchanged
    • Enchantress: +6% Impetus Damage (Level 25)
    • Brewmaster: +2s Thunderclap Slow (Level 20)
    • Beastmaster: +1 Boar Summoned (Level 15)
    • Zeus: +0.5s Lightning Bolt Ministun (Level 20)
    • Lycan: +12 Feral HP Regen (Level 15)
    • Crystal Maiden: +50 Freezing Field Damage (Level 20)
    • Shadow Shaman: +4 Wards Summoned (Level 20)
    • Visage: Soul Assumption Double Strike
      • Hits a random 2nd target within cast range
      • Prioritizes heroes
    • Winter Wyvern: +1s Cold Embrace Duration (Level 20)
    • Witch Doctor: +2 Cask Bounces (Level 15)
    • Legion Commander: +10% Moment Proc Chance (Level 20)
    • Keeper of the Light: +300 Chakra Magic Mana (Level 15)
    • Dazzle: +25 Poison Touch DPS (Level 20)
    • Treant: +40 Leech Seed Damage/Heal (Level 25)
    • Sand King: -50 Epicenter Attack Slow (Level 15)
    • Venomancer: +14% Poison Sting Slow (Level 25)
    • Ancient Apparition: +8% Ice Vortex Slow/Resistance (Level 20)
    • Chen: +1000 Creep Health (Level 20)
    • Disruptor: +40 Thunder Strike Damage (Level 15)
    • Elder Titan: +200 Mana (Level 10)
    • Io: Tether Stuns (Level 25)
    • Jakiro: Macropyre Pure and Pierces Immunity (Level 25)
    • Lion: +75 Cast Range (Level 10)
    • Nature's Prophet: Removed Teleportation Cooldown (Level 25)
    • Oracle: +0.75s Fortune's End Max Duration (Level 10)
    • Phoenix: +20% XP Gain (Level 10)
    • Pugna: +1s Decrepify Duration (Level 15)
    • Shadow Demon: -1.5s Shadow Poison Cooldown (Level 20)
    • Spirit Breaker: +30% Greater Bash Damage (Level 20)
    • Templar Assassin: -8 Meld Armor Reduction (Level 25)
    • Undying: +15 Health Regeneration (Level 10)
    • Techies: +250 Attack Damage (Level 25)

label: Aether Lens

• Aether Lens Spell Amplification increased from 5% to 6%
  • Reworked Aether Lens recipe

descriptionHtml: • Clarity buff is now purgeable

descriptionHtml: • No longer a Unique Attack Modifier

• Cost reduced from 110 to 100

descriptionHtml: • Gains +2 health regen (from force staff changes above)

descriptionHtml:
• Recipe cost increased from 1550 to 1650
  • XP multiplier increased from 1.75× to 1.85×
  • Gold bonus reduced from 220 to 200

label: Healing Salve
descriptionHtml: • Healing Salve buff is now purgeable

label: Heart of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires a second Vitality Booster instead of the 1400 recipe
  • Strength bonus reduced from 45 to 40
  • Health bonus increased from 250 to 500

label: Heaven's Halberd
descriptionHtml:
• Can no longer be dispelled by Spell Immunity
    • Other dispel sources like Manta are already unable to dispel it

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml:
• Now uses a Ring of Health instead of an 800 gold recipe
  • Health regeneration increased from 8 to 10

label: Mask of Madness
descriptionHtml:
• Requires a Quarterstaff instead of a 700 gold recipe
  • Provides +20 Damage and +10 Attack Speed
  • Berserk active attack speed bonus reduced from +120 to +110
  • Can now be disassembled

label: Morbid Mask
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 1200 to 1100
  • Bonus damage reduced from +15 to +10

label: Solar Crest
descriptionHtml:
• Solar Crest Armor Addition/Removal reduced from 12 to 10
  • Solar Crest on enemies changed from 25% Miss chance on target to 25% True Strike chance on attackers

label: Moon Shard
descriptionHtml: • Moon Shard now gives half of the bonus night vision when consumed

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml: • Demonic Summoning duration increased from 40 to 45

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 65 to 60 (allows for different starting item combinations)

label: Radiance
descriptionHtml: • Radiance damage on illusions reduced from 40 to 35

label: Refresher Orb
descriptionHtml: • Refresh now replenishes charge-based abilities

descriptionHtml: • Reworked Rod of Atos recipe

descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced by 100

descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 500 to 700

label: Urn of Shadows
descriptionHtml:

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:

  • Unstable Concoction AoE increased from 175 to 200

  • Greevil's Greed bonus cap rescaled from 12/20/28/36 to 16/20/24/28

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Attack range increased from 600 to 675
  • Ice Vortexmovement modifier has a positive effect on Ancient Apparition
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +8% Ice Vortex Slow/Resistance (Level 20)

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Scepter on Axe:
    • CausesBattle Hungerto reduce enemy total damage output by 30%
    • Applies Battle Hunger on enemy heroes within a 700 AoE after a successfulCulling Blade

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Bane's Scepter:
    • CausesBrain Sapto have a 1.5 second cooldown
    • Pierces Spell Immunity
  • Bane Agi/Int growth increased by 0.3, matching new strength growth
  • Fiend's Gripdeals damage every 0.5 seconds instead of every 1 second

descriptionHtml: • FixedShuriken TossScepter interrupting the chain if one of the targets is Spell Immune

descriptionHtml:

descriptionHtml:
• Scorched Earthhealing/damage rescaled from 10/20/30/40 to 16/24/32/40

    • Primarily affects this hero, allowing Doom to Devour a small wolf without replacing the stored ability

  • Rabid cooldown reduced from 45 to 35
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +50% Spirit Bear Magic Resistance (Level 20)

label: Luna
descriptionHtml: • Lucent Beamcast animation reduced from 0.6 to 0.5

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +12 Feral HP Regen (Level 15)

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed reduced from 315 to 310
  • Reworked Magnus's Scepter:
    • Shockwavecomes back, hitting units a second time and applying a 60% slow for 2 seconds
    • Distance and travel speed are increased by 50%
    • Return wave deals half damage to creeps
  • Reverse Polarityno longer lasts an extra 0.75/1/1.25 seconds on creeps
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +500 Skewer Range (Level 25)
  • Level 25 Talent from -4s Shockwave Cooldown to +15 Armor

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter for Medusa:
    • CausesMystic Snaketo turn enemies into stone for 1 second
    • Increases by 0.2 seconds per bounce

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• Mirana base damage increased by 3
  • Starstormsecond impact delay reduced from 1 to 0.8
  • Leapspeed bonus reduced from 10 seconds to 5
  • Leap attack speed bonus increased from 8/16/24/32 to 16/32/48/64

label: Monkey King
descriptionHtml:
• Wukong's Commandno longer provides 50/70/90 bonus damage
  • Wukong's Command provides you with 8/14/20 bonus armor
  • Wukong's Command army no longer copy Basher/Abyssal
  • Wukong's Command attack rate improved from 2 to 1.7
  • Fixed Monkey King carrying Urn of Shadows sometimes wasting charges while Wukong's Command is ongoing
  • FixedTree Dancecausing Monkey King to temporarily have bigger vision than the defined day/night values

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml: • Adaptive Strikemana cost rescaled from 100/90/80/70 to 80

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Song of the Sirencast time increased from 0.8 to 1
  • Song of the Siren cooldown rescaled from 180/120/60 to 160/120/80
  • Song of the Siren range rescaled from 1250 to 1000/1200/1400
  • Mirror ImageIllusion damage taken rescaled from 600/500/400/300% to 550/500/450/400%
  • Rip Tidedamage increased from 100/140/180/220 to 120/160/200/240
  • Ensnarecast point reduced from 0.65 to 0.6
  • Ensnare mana cost rescaled from 90/100/110/120 to 100

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: Removed Teleportation Cooldown (Level 25)

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml: • Ghost Shroudheal amplification increased from 50% to 75%

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml:
• Hunter in the Nightcan now be activated during the night to grant Night Stalker flying movement for 2 seconds
    • Cooldown 26/22/18/14
    • Mana Cost 50
    • 1200 Vision

label: Oracle
descriptionHtml:
• Fortune's Endis now a root rather than a slow that sets the target to 0 movement speed
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +0.75s Fortune's End Max Duration (Level 10)
  • Fortune's End projectile speed from 1200 to 1000
  • Purifying Flamescast range from 800 to 850

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Outworld Devourer's Scepter:
    • Grants 2 charges toAstral Imprisonment
    • Increases cast range by 300
    • Damage areas stack
    • Replenish Time: 12

label: Phantom Lancer
descriptionHtml:
• FixedDoppelgangerIllusions lasting one second less than intended
  • Phantom Rushagility bonus is now granted before the first hit lands, rather than after
  • Juxtaposemax illusions increased from 5/7/9 to 6/8/10

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Fire Spiritsduration increased from 16 to 20
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +20% XP Gain (Level 10)

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +1s Dismember Duration (Level 20)

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Life Drainnow grants true sight vision over the target
  • Life Drain cast range reduced from 900/1050/1200 to 800
  • Life Drain now has a 100 range break buffer (Breaks at 900 range)
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +1s Decrepify Duration (Level 15)

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml: • Queen of Pain Level 25 Talent from No Shadow Strike cooldown to 550 AoE Shadow Strike

label: Razor
descriptionHtml:
• Eye of the Stormprioritizes strikingStatic Linkedheroes
  • Eye of the Storm no longer has a cast point

label: Riki
descriptionHtml: • Base movement speed reduced by 5

  • Replaced Respawn Talent: -50 Epicenter Attack Slow (Level 15)

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Poisonmana cost reduced from 55 to 50
  • Soul Catchernow spreads its amplification evenly among all the enemies in the AoE
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: -1.5s Shadow Poison Cooldown (Level 20)

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Fiend Level 25 Talent from +125 Shadowraze Damage to +150

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 6
  • Mass Serpent Wardsbase attack range increased by 50
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +4 Wards Summoned (Level 20)

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Silencer's Scepter:
    • Glaives of Wisdomnow Pierce Spell Immunity and deal 100% more damage against Silenced units

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml: • Level 15 Talent from +75 Damage to +10% Spell Lifesteal

label: Slark
descriptionHtml: • Intelligence gain reduced from 1.9 to 1.7

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml: • Hauntcooldown rescaled from 140/130/120 to 180/150/120

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +30% Greater Bash Damage (Level 20)

descriptionHtml:
• God's Strengthnow grants a bonus 16/28/40 Strength when activated
  • God's Strength attack bonus reduced from 100/150/200% to 80/120/160%

label: Techies
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +250 Attack Damage (Level 25)

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Agility gain reduced from 2.7 to 2.3
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: -8 Meld Armor Reduction (Level 25)

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• MetamorphosisMovement Speed Loss increased from 25 to 30

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml:
• Gushmana cost rescaled from 120 to 90/100/110/120
  • Aghanim's Gush now does a small ground reveal on units that are hit

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:

  • GrowincreasesCraggy Exteriorchance by 6/8/10%

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Nature's Guisenow applies a full disarming root, rather than a bash, on attack
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +40 Leech Seed Damage/Heal (Level 25)

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Improved consistency ofIce Shardswhen pushing units in/out of the shards on impact
  • Ice Shards now starts the blockers at the cast location, rather than centering the blockers around the cast location
  • Ice Shards cast range increased by 200
    • As a result of the other change, the effective cast range would have been 200 less
  • Ice Shards speed increased from 1100 to 1200

label: Underlord
descriptionHtml:
• Atrophy Auradamage reduction rescaled from 4/16/28/40% to 7/18/29/40%
  • Atrophy Aura counter now lingers through death
  • Added Underlord Scepter:
    • Atrophy Aura's bonus damage is now granted to nearby allied heroes for half of the bonuses
    • Increases bonus damage duration by 40 seconds

label: Undying
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +15 Health Regeneration (Level 10)

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml: • Base damage reduced by 3

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:

  • Vengeance Aurareduced from 12/20/28/36% to 10/18/26/34%

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +14% Poison Sting Slow (Level 25)

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• Viper Strikenow deals its first tick of damage immediately
  • Viper Strike cooldown rescaled from 70/50/30 to 60/45/30

descriptionHtml:
• Grave Chillduration increased from 3/4/5/6 to 3.25/4.5/5.75/7

    • Hits a random 2nd target within cast range, prioritizes heroes

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Windranger Level 20 Talents are now: Windrun grants invisibility // +120 Powershot Damage

descriptionHtml:
• Winter's Curseattack speed from 70 to 85

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Scepter now additionally provides True Strike toDeath Ward
  • Replaced Respawn Talent: +2 Cask Bounces (Level 15)

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Level 20 Talent from +20 Strength to +10% Vampiric Aura Lifesteal
  • Level 25 Talent from +20% Vampiric Aura Lifesteal to Reincarnation Casts Wraithfire Blast
    • Replaces the slow
    • Fires Wraithfire Blasts at half the projectile speed

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml: • Replaced Respawn Talent: +0.5s Lightning Bolt Ministun (Level 20)
